p: Dihydrocurcumin, tetramethylcurcumin, bisdemethoxycurcumin, curcumin-d6, demethoxycurcumin, demethylcurcumin, dimethylcurcumin, curcumin, tetrahydrocurcumin, octahydrocurcumin, hexahydrocurcumin and oseltamivir carboxylate were acquired from Shanghai yuanye Bio-Technology Co. Ltd. (Shanghai, China). Purity was ≥ 99% by high-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC).
